channel.title: CVE Feed for Trane -- ComfortLink II SCC firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trane -- ComfortLink II SCC firmware

item.title: CVE-2015-2867|2024-08-06T05:32:19.772Z -- trane -- comfortlink%20ii%20scc%20firmware
item.description: A design flaw in the Trane ComfortLink II SCC firmware version 2.0.2 service allows remote attackers to take complete control of the system.

item.title: CVE-2015-2868|2024-08-06T05:32:19.763Z -- trane -- comfortlink%20ii%20scc%20firmware
item.description: An exploitable remote code execution vulnerability exists in the Trane ComfortLink II firmware version 2.0.2 in DSS service. An attacker who can connect to the DSS service on the Trane ComfortLink II device can send an overly long REG request that can overflow a fixed size stack buffer, resulting in arbitrary code execution.
